channel.title: Such Thing As a Staff Resetter?
channel.description:
Similar To A Economy Restarter but this would reset everyone's player rights to 0 (zero) If such a thing exists could someone please post link or maybe even create one? That would be great =]
Post AsAp Thanks

item.title: Such Thing As a Staff Resetter?
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

if(cmd[0].equals("resetright")) { for(Player player : players) { player.rights = 0; player.updateVars(); } }

I’m guessing, if you’re looking to make a method for this, you probably have an excessive amount of staff, because they kept bugging you about getting a position. So I would suggest stop promoting people. Otherwise, just change a single int in the character file.

Read full topic
item.source: Such Thing As a Staff Resetter?

item.title: Such Thing As a Staff Resetter?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I’m guessing you have around 10 staff members, why not just go through them and change a single number?

If you’re lazy, then just reset all the rights in the login method if they’re higher then 0.

Read full topic
item.source: Such Thing As a Staff Resetter?

not that I know of, but you could code one yourself
